data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marceniuk, Alexandre P., Caires, Rodrigo, Siccha-Ramirez, Raquel, Oliveira, Claudio (2016): Review of the harvestfishes, genus Peprilus (Perciformes: Stromateidae), of the Atlantic coast of South America. Zootaxa 4098 (2): 311-332, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4098.2.6
